name: The Unstable Castle
description:
A little game for Ludum Dare 49, trying out Godot for the first time.

Dungeon tiles were drawn by Tilation https://tilation.itch.io/multi-size-mythical-dungeon-tileset. 

Character by o_lobster https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

All other things drawn (badly) by me
